name: json.cf
description: A dead simple, latency-optimized JSON config at the edge.
author: Christo Todorov <chroxify@gmail.com>

scripts.build: bun run build:core && bun run build:react && bun run build:types
scripts.build:core: bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --minify --sourcemap --external react && bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --minify --sourcemap --format cjs --external react && bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --minify --sourcemap --format esm --external react && bun run build:types
scripts.build:react: bun build ./src/frameworks/react/index.ts --outdir dist/frameworks/react --target node --minify --sourcemap --external react && bun build ./src/frameworks/react/index.ts --outdir dist/frameworks/react --target node --minify --sourcemap --format cjs --external react && bun build ./src/frameworks/react/index.ts --outdir dist/frameworks/react --target node --minify --sourcemap --format esm --external react && bun run build:types
